resources.string: Ask a question - shake your phone!

To use the program, just ask your question and just shake your phone - the magic ball of predictions will give you the answer! if you shake again, you will get a new answer to a new question! P.S. This program is not a direct predictor of what happened or will happen, it is created for entertainment purposes!
Let me think, ask me in an hour
Better tomorrow ask me about it
I know the answer but I won"t tell!
